00036 class RegisterAsPin : public Pin {
00037 public:
00042         RegisterAsPin(unsigned int *reg) {
00043                 this->reg = reg;
00044         }
00045 
00050         virtual ~RegisterPin() { }
00051 
00057         virtual void set(bool value) { *(this->reg) = (value) ? 0xFFFFFFFF : 0x0; }
00058

00065
